column2: the Church of the Brethren in Nigeria (EYN Church) with its headquarters in Mubi in the northern zone of the state

The Church of the Brethren in Nigeria (EYN church) was founded in Garkida Gombi Local Government of the state in March 1923 by American missionaries. The Lutheran Church of Christ in Nigeria (LCCN Church) was founded in Numan by Dutch missionaries in 1913.
